name: Hot Shot BBALL Breakout - A Basketball Shoot Em Up
name_original: Hot Shot BBALL Breakout - A Basketball Shoot Em Up
description:
Hot Shot BBALL - BREAK OUT


Time to Break Out!

Hot Shot Basketball!!

Play against the Clock in this Action Packed Basketball GAME!

Shoot 2 and 3 Point Shots until the timer runs out!

Gamecenter Enabled!! Multiple Achievements and Leaderboards!

VERY RE PLAYABLE!

TWO BONUSES!

GET 7 shots in a row to go ON FIRE!!

SHOOT special ball for 2X BONUS on all shots!

DOWNLOAD TODAY!
